subject: [programming note]
body: i gave deborah the password to this account so she can send emails and i am going to try to recommit to sending them also instead of occasionally starting them and letting them scope creep away from me and giving up and feeling bad about it. deborah's emails will have their subject lines end in `(deborah)`. xoxo gossip girl![snoopy in a keffiyeh in front of a flag](/letters/images/40.png)
